A method breakpoint can have a line breakpoint request in the case that its 
signature can be resolved exactly (which is more efficient than using a method 
entry request). This looks like a problem on all platforms.
*** Bug 32723 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Added two JUnit tests to MethodBreakpointTests

* testThreadFilterInclusive
* testThreadFilterExclusive
